title: Sampler, 1830–35
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 48 x 52 cm (18 7/8 x 20 1/2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Thirty samplers (6 have the name Rebecca Laney with dates); with phrases or religious verses.  All appear to be from the same period.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1830–35.
1830–35. Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-82.
